title: Update dashboard FieldCard attribute layout to 3 columns and add user-selectable light background colors

requirements.text: Update the Dashboard FieldCard attribute list (Urgency, Value, Interest, Influence, Duration) so the attributes are laid out in a 3-column responsive grid, and on large screens they should remain on a single horizontal row (no wrapping) by using a horizontal scroll or other non-wrapping layout when needed.

quotes: make it 3 columns as I see it fits in one row.
attibutes of a field card in dashboard page

acceptanceCriteria: On the dashboard fields view, each FieldCard shows the five attributes in a layout that uses 3 columns at the intended breakpoint(s).
On large screens, the five attributes do not wrap onto multiple lines within a FieldCard; if they exceed available width, the attribute area remains a single row and can be horizontally scrolled.
No other parts of the Dashboard (search/sort controls, field grid layout, field detail view) regress visually or functionally.

requirements.text: Add a user-selectable background color option for Dashboard FieldCards using a light color palette, and apply the selected background color to the FieldCard container in the dashboard.

quotes: make possible to change the background colour of field card also (light pallette)

acceptanceCriteria: Users can choose a background color for a field card from a predefined light palette using the existing field edit flow (or an equivalent obvious UI affordance on the dashboard).
The selected background color persists (survives page reload) and is applied whenever the field card is rendered on the dashboard.
The background color choices are visually light (high-contrast with text/icons in both light and dark theme modes).
Field create, edit, and list flows continue to work without errors.

requirements.text: Define a consistent light-palette background color set (IDs + labels) for field card backgrounds and expose it in the frontend where the background selection UI is implemented.
acceptanceCriteria: A fixed list of light background color options exists in code (with stable IDs) for reuse across the UI.
User-facing labels for these colors are in English and displayed in the selection UI.
Selecting each option visibly changes the field card background to the corresponding color.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit frontend immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if existing stable state requires migration.
nonGoals: Changing the overall dashboard field grid (number of FieldCards per row) outside of adjusting the FieldCard attribute layout.
Adding third-party theming libraries or external persistence layers.
Adding real-time collaboration or syncing background choices across multiple users beyond existing per-user data storage.
